instructions: Indicate whether the generalized pigeonhole principle can be used to prove the following statements.
question: Alice bought 14 cups of coffee in a week. Then there was a day in the week in which she bought at least three cups of coffee.
explanation:
Correct

It is possible that Alice bought two cups of coffee every day for a week which means she would have bought 14 cups of coffee in the week but not had a day in which she bought more than two cups of coffee.
